description:
Welcome !

If you are reading this, chances are, you have a mac or you want to buy one.

Mac's need no introduction. They are fast, stable and of course beautifully designed!

Also, they are loaded with features.

But, do you use your mac to its fullest ?

Do you know all the cool features that come built in with mac,- features that can save you a lot of time everyday and money?(by not having to buy extra software !)

My experience shows that most people do not use their macs to its best ! 

And that is why, I put this course together !

So that you can take your mac productivity to its max.

Some of the cool things you will learn in this course :

Create a keyboard shortcut to launch any application!

Get the " not responding" applications to respond without force quitting them !

Create a neat , organized workflow !

Record your screen along with audio, without paying for any extra software!

Talk to your mac, so that it handles the typing for you !

Locate any file on your mac, within seconds, without having to know/worry about its location !

Shut down your mac , real fast!

Trim/Merge videos without any additional software.

and many more tips and feature!

This course contains 50 videos, each explaining a carefully chosen tip or a feature,which can save you time and money.

And, I will add 2 updates to this class every month and whenever there is a new release of mac os x!

After completing this course, you will fully realize your mac's awesome potential and  yes, you will love your mac even more and never want to buy anything else !
title: Using your mac to its fullest
